dct_description_sm: by M.F. Maury, A.M. Lieut., U.S. Navy ; constructed by Lts. Leigh. Herndon & Fleming & Pd. Midn. Jackson.
Includes "Explanation" indicating whale types and notes, as well as index for "best fishing season."
Shows whale habitations throughout the world, including area "unexplored by whalemen."
dct_creator_sm: United States, Bureau of Ordnance and Hydrography.
dct_publisher_sm: National Observatory by authority of Commo. L. Warrington Chief of bureau of Ordnance & Hydrography,
